rpanel.js

00001 W.dev.rpanel = function(){
00002     var footerHeight = '100px';
00003     var textStyle = 'fontSize:11px;fontFamily:verdana;';
00004     // add form fields
00005      addFields();
00006 
00007     // compose footer
00008     var footer = W.style('div', 'top:'+ (W.height - parseInt(footerHeight))
00009         +'px;left:0px;width:'+ W.width +'px;height:'+ footerHeight
00010         +';position:absolute;background:#f5f5f5;display:none;');
00011     W.root.appendChild(footer);
00012 
00013     var tbox = W.style('textarea', 'width:100%;height:'+ footerHeight
00014         +';border:1px solid silver;'+ textStyle);
00015     footer.appendChild(tbox);
00016     
00017     W.event(window, 'onresize', function(){
00018         W.refresh();
00019         footer.style.top = (W.height - parseInt(footerHeight)) +'px';
00020         footer.style.width = W.width +'px';
00021     });
00022     
00023     // lookup server id
00024     var forum = 0;
00025     switch(this.team){
00026         case 'dxul': forum = 107; break;
00027         case 'oracle': forum = 110; break;
00028         default:
00029     }
00030     
00031     var ereport = new W.EReporter({
00032         server: 'http://wednus.com/imod/posting.php?f='+ forum,
00033         ignore: W.dev.plus,
00034         verbose: false
00035     });
00036     ereport.report_test = function(){};
00037     window.onerror = ereport.onerror;
00038     
00039     ereport.onreport = function(message){
00040         tbox.value = message;
00041         var e = W.$('error');
00042         e.value = message;
00043         e.style.color = 'red';
00044         e.style.height = '220px';
00045         footer.style.display = 'block';
00046     };
00047     
00048     function addFields(){
00049         var props = new W.FormGen({
00050             action: 'http://wednus.com/index.php',
00051             labelColumeWidth: '50px',
00052             color: 'silver',
00053             wss: 'fontSize:11px;fontFamily:Tahoma,Verdana;color:navy',
00054             wps: W.dev.wps
00055         });
00056         props.body.style.zIndex = 3000;
00057         props.body.style.opacity = W.dev.opacity;
00058         props.body.style.filter = 'alpha(opacity='+ (W.dev.opacity * 100) +')';
00059         
00060         // override the default submission method
00061         props.submit = function(fields){
00062             ereport.fields['username'].value = W.$('dev.id').value;
00063             ereport.fields['subject'].value = W.$('title').value;
00064             var m = ereport.fields['message'];
00065             if(m.value != '')
00066                 m.value += '[hr]';
00067             m.value += W.$('comment').value;
00068             ereport.report();
00069         }
00070         
00071         var fields = 'team,dev.id,title'.split(',');
00072         for(var i = 0; i < fields.length; ++i){
00073             props.add({
00074                 id: fields[i],
00075                 caption: fields[i] +':'
00076             });
00077         }
00078 
00079         var fields = 'error,comment'.split(',');
00080         for(var i = 0; i < fields.length; ++i){
00081             props.add({
00082                 id: fields[i],
00083                 tag: 'textarea',
00084                 caption: fields[i] +':'
00085             });
00086         }
00087         
00088         W.$('dev.id').value = W.dev.id;
00089         var t = W.$('team');
00090         var e = W.$('error')
00091         e.value = 'no error detected.';
00092         t.value = W.dev.team;
00093         t.style.color = e.style.color = 'gray';
00094         t.readOnly = e.readOnly = true;
00095         t.style.background = e.style.background = '#F5F5F5';
00096         t.onclick = e.onclick = function(){};
00097     };
00098 };
00099 
00100 W.dev.version = '0.0.1';
